underscores the significant importance of air travel in the country's tourism sector. According to

Chennai as  their  last  stop  before  reaching  Sri  Lanka.  Furthermore,  the  top  airlines  favored  by
tourists arriving in Sri Lanka were Sri Lankan Airlines, Qatar Airways, and Emirates, collectively
accounting for 55% of total tourist arrivals. This underscores the critical role of air transportation
